name: Slack Stack
description:
Everyone can build a tower in tetris. However, reality is not as accurate. How tall of a building can you build from not so trivial shape of elements?

Use your left mouse button to rotate your camera, your middle mouse button to release the next object onto your slack stack, and use the handlers around your object to rotate or move it to any direction.

You lose as soon as an object touches the ground.

Screenshots can be shared with the community: https://slackstack.rapaxsoft.com/

Please keep in mind, that the game has been created for the 2018 Epic Mega Jam, therefore time constrains have limited the scope of the features, variety and environment. Still, we hope you will enjoy playing it as much as we did the development process.

Have fun!
